name: Senior Manager, Tax Compliance, Tax&Legal Group
description:
Responsibilities

Participation in the following assignments:

  • Supervising work of junior personnel on tax compliance projects, including tax and other statutory (financial, statistical) reporting;
  • Control over preparing client deliverables, including written advice and reports, tax calculations, tax returns and financial statements;
  • Developing and maintaining strong professional relationships with clients;
  • Regularly updating information on market opportunities and identifying potential areas for additional work
  • Coaching and mentoring junior staff
  • Developing business and selling services

To fill the role a candidate is expected to meet the following requirements:

  • Higher education (degree preferably in economics, finance, accounting, mathematics)
  • At least 5-7 years of experience as a Chief accountant or Tax Manager gained in reputable Kazakhstan or international companies or minimum 2 years at Manager’s position in Big4
  • Excellent knowledge of Kazakh tax and accounting legislation
  • Proficiency in 1C is a plus
  • Relevant Kazakh or international qualification is a plus
  • At least upper-intermediate English, fluent Russian and Kazakh
  • Advanced computer skills (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint)
  • Good organizational and teamwork skills
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Attention to details
  • Ability to work under tight deadlines and multitask
  • Ability to go on business trips is a plus

We offer:

  • A wide range of training and development programs
  • Opportunities for further development of professional skills through participation in diverse projects with international focus
  • Comprehensive remuneration package
  • Transparent path of career growth
